metadata.title: CVE-2018-19532 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the function PdfTranslator::setTarget() in pdftranslator.cpp of PoDoFo 0.9.6, while creating the PdfXObject, as demonstrated by podofoimpose. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19532` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
libpodofo0.9.7 - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
